action.name: Multiattack
entries: The behir makes one Bite attack and uses Constrict.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 10}, reach 10 ft. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d12 + 6}) Piercing damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) Lightning damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 18}, one Large or smaller creature the behir can see within 5 feet. {@actSaveFail} 28 ({@damage 5d8 + 6}) Bludgeoning damage. The target has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 16}), and it has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition until the grapple ends.

action.name: Lightning Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 16}, each creature in a 90-foot-long, 5-foot-wide {@variantrule Line [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Line}. {@actSaveFail} 66 ({@damage 12d10}) Lightning damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.
